# Lambda Function Folder to ECR Repository Mapping
# Format: <folder-name>:<ecr-repository-name>
# 
# Example:
# lambda-function-1:my-lambda-function-1-repo
# lambda-function-2:my-lambda-function-2-repo
# lambda-function-3:my-lambda-function-3-repo
# lambda-function-4:my-lambda-function-4-repo
# lambda-function-5:my-lambda-function-5-repo
# lambda-function-6:my-lambda-function-6-repo
# lambda-function-7:my-lambda-function-7-repo
# lambda-function-8:my-lambda-function-8-repo
# lambda-function-9:my-lambda-function-9-repo
# lambda-function-10:my-lambda-function-10-repo

# Replace these with your actual folder names and ECR repository names
lambda-function-1:lambda-function-1-repo
lambda-function-2:lambda-function-2-repo
lambda-function-3:lambda-function-3-repo
lambda-function-4:lambda-function-4-repo
lambda-function-5:lambda-function-5-repo
lambda-function-6:lambda-function-6-repo
lambda-function-7:lambda-function-7-repo
lambda-function-8:lambda-function-8-repo
lambda-function-9:lambda-function-9-repo
lambda-function-10:lambda-function-10-repo
